title: Meet Maurice!
itunes:title: Meet Maurice!
description: Today on The Cigar Authority meet the hottest new cigar maker, Maurice Koks, as we smoke his Best Buy Vallejuelo Cigars! Check out what Cigar Aficionado calls the Best Bargain of 2010. It's time for the finer things in life... It's time for The Cigar Authority!
